_header: All vanities forsake if thou his love will feel
_description: A Warning against Worldly Vanities — fifteen monorhyming quatrains with medial rhyme

CULDd564.First Lines:
all vanitese forsake if þu his lufe will feleþi hert til
                    hym þu take he kan it kepe sa weleþe myrth na man may make of god
                    es ilk a deleþi thoght lat it noght qwake þi lufe lat it not
                    kele…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…And vse þe in praiyng þar in þu may be mendSwa
                    þat þow hafe þi keyng in ioy with owten endyng

Lincoln91.First Lines:
All vanytese for sake If þou his lufe will feleThi hert
                    þou hym by take he kane it kepe full wele…Thi myrthe na man may
                    make of godd es ilke a deleThi thoghte late it noghte qwake thi lufe late
                    it noghte kele…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…And thow sal heyene wendeThow sall hym se with eghe And come
                    to criste þi frende

Longleat29.First Lines:
All vanytees forsake If þou his loue wil feleThe hert þou
                    hym bitake he can hit kepe so welle…
Longleat29.Last Lines:
…Avise þe in preynge That in þou may þe mendAnd
                    þou shal loue þi kynge I ioy withouten end Amen
